name: Power Play :Game Jam Winner
description:
Power Play was an entry for the Faku'gesi Game Jam which lasted two and a half days. The game jam's theme was " Something Uniquely African".  My team, Vetkoek Studios, are all from South Africa, so we decided to stick to something that was unique to South Africa. As soon as we received the theme, I immediately got load-shedding, so I suggested that we make our game about load-shedding. 

If you do not know what load-shedding is,  it is when our electricity supply is purposely switched off by the power suppliers to avoid excessive load on the generating plant.  It can be very frustrating and takes a toll on us South Africans.

But, with our load-shedding game, we won first prize! This awarded us with an incubation that sponsors us for the year,2023, to work on this game.
